name: contact
title: Contact
copy: I specialize in building small and medium-sized campaign sites and maintaining large platforms. I prefer projects with a strong sense of UI/UX and backed by passionate people like me.
copy2: Feel free to drop me a line at luca.allievi.dev@gmail.com. I can also be found on LinkedIn, Stackoverflow, Github and Facebook (although I rarely wander through those f-lands these days).
